Description of incident: CarePlus Health Plans have notified customers of a data breach when an error in processing their statements exposed their personal information to other members. The machine that processed these statement had a programming error that inserted two statements into one envelope vs. just one.According to the company, no Social Security numbers were on these statements. The information compromised included names, addresses and CarePlus identification numbers. For those affected, call 1-800-794-5907 from 8:00 a.m. to 8 p.m ESt seven days a week. More information: http://www.wtsp.com/story/news/health/2015/10/09/careplus-might-mishandl...
